name: Grabbage
description:
Grab Baggage in Grabbage! A random bag is shown in the upper left and you must locate and then grab the correct bag as fast as possible. Use the control panel to speed up or rewind. Swap bags between belts using the swapperiser to access bags on the far belts. You will get a score and a new bag at the end of each round. After 10 rounds, your final score can be entered into a (local) leaderboard.

Grabbage was made in Unreal 4 over a single university semester by one person. No assets or starter content was used, with the exception of audio. I am not an audio person. In fact, I would recommend muting this monstrosity.

*Note - This is a solo, student game made with a deadline.*

There may be bugs, quirks, compatibility issues or all of the above.

It is lacking some basic features such as:

  • Pause
  • Window and resolution options
  • Audio options
  • Input options
